gap_reason: Requires high-quality continuous EHR data and lacks deployment feasibility in low-resource or rural ICUs.
potential_research_direction: Develop robust missing-data handling models and lightweight edge-compatible ICU prediction systems.

gap_reason: Battery constraints limit long-term monitoring and scalability for continuous outpatient usage.
potential_research_direction: Energy-efficient model compression and ultra-low-power AI chip integration.

gap_reason: Model bias toward specific demographic training data reduces cross-population reliability.
potential_research_direction: Bias-aware training with federated multi-demographic datasets.

gap_reason: Computational predictions require wet-lab validation and lack automated experimental integration.
potential_research_direction: Closed-loop AI with robotic lab automation and active learning feedback.

gap_reason: Federated learning approach raises privacy and synchronization challenges across heterogeneous devices.
potential_research_direction: Secure aggregation protocols with adaptive personalization layers.

gap_reason: High computational cost for gigapixel pathology images limits deployment in smaller hospitals.
potential_research_direction: Hierarchical patch-based transformers with model pruning.

gap_reason: Reduced accuracy in obese patients indicates limited physiological generalization.
potential_research_direction: Adaptive models trained across diverse BMI distributions.

gap_reason: Requires extensive longitudinal patient data not universally available.
potential_research_direction: Synthetic patient simulation environments for RL pre-training.

gap_reason: Limited cross-ethnic generalization in multimodal Alzheimer prediction.
potential_research_direction: Global federated multimodal datasets with fairness-aware optimization.

gap_reason: Accuracy degrades during physical activity due to motion artifacts.
potential_research_direction: Motion-compensated signal filtering with sensor fusion.

gap_reason: Requires high-resolution retinal images, limiting rural screening deployment.
potential_research_direction: Super-resolution pre-processing models for low-cost cameras.

gap_reason: Depends on high-performance computing resources, limiting accessibility.
potential_research_direction: Distributed lightweight molecular modeling frameworks.

gap_reason: Model effectiveness relies on consistent device usage by patients.
potential_research_direction: Passive monitoring systems integrated with environmental IoT.

gap_reason: Saliency maps may highlight non-causal correlations, risking misinterpretation.
potential_research_direction: Causal explainability frameworks for medical imaging AI.

gap_reason: Emotionally expressive users may trigger incorrect crisis alerts.
potential_research_direction: Context-aware longitudinal conversational modeling.

gap_reason: Dependent on accurate manual dietary input from patients.
potential_research_direction: Automated meal recognition using computer vision.

gap_reason: Federated communication overhead increases with participating hospitals.
potential_research_direction: Adaptive client selection and compression-aware federated learning.

gap_reason: Limited usability among elderly populations unfamiliar with apps.
potential_research_direction: Voice-assisted and zero-UI inhaler feedback systems.

gap_reason: Self-supervised models lack transparency for physician validation.
potential_research_direction: Hybrid symbolic-neural rare disease detection models.

gap_reason: Limited integration with external primary care and cross-institution systems.
potential_research_direction: Interoperable healthcare APIs using FHIR standards.

gap_reason: Prediction consistency affected by smartphone image quality variability.
potential_research_direction: Standardized image calibration modules in mobile apps.

gap_reason: System depends heavily on structured EHR documentation quality.
potential_research_direction: Robust NLP pipelines for noisy and semi-structured records.

gap_reason: False alarms during intense activity may reduce trust and adoption.
potential_research_direction: Context-aware activity recognition integration.

gap_reason: Prediction accuracy decreases with sparse microbial datasets.
potential_research_direction: Meta-learning for low-sample resistance prediction.
